For example "POSTGRESQL", "MYSQL", "ORACLE" --> <databasetype>POSTGRESQL</databasetype> <!-- What is the URL for the database server? --> <URL>jdbc:mysql://192.168.100.138:3306/yourlims</URL> <!-- Forces the use of unicode character encoding.
